title: I say that my Architect/Licensed Surveyor has certified the said area on the basis of the property register card duly certified by the Superintendent of Land Records and/or on the basis survey carried out as per the boundaries of the property shown by me/us
clause_text: I say that my Architect/Licensed Surveyor has certified the said area on the basis of the property register card duly certified by the Superintendent of Land Records and/or on the basis survey carried out as per the boundaries of the property shown by me/us. The said area works out to sq. m (in words sq. m. 0and F.S.I is claimed for the plot area sq.m. It may also be stated here that I/we do not hold /own any contiguous land with the subject land.
